      • queryJSON

        public String queryJSON(String json,
                        int plan)
        Description copied from interface: Client
        Translate a JSON specification to an XQuery
        Specified by:
        queryJSON in interface Client
        Parameters:
        json - - JSON query specification, see Tethys Restful Web Interfaces document for details on specification.
        plan - - 0 : Run query 1 : Return dbXML schema plan (does not execute query) 2 : Return XQuery (does not execute query)
        Returns:
        query result, plan, or XQuery
